ivardefs.name: author
ivardefs.desc: The person, organization or device that created the flag.

ivardefs.name: category
ivardefs.desc: Allows an flag to be divided into different categories like clinical, administrative etc. Intended to be used as a means of filtering which flags are displayed to particular user or in a given context.

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: The coded value or textual component of the flag to display to the user.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: This alert is only relevant during the encounter.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Identifier assigned to the flag for external use (outside the FHIR environment).

ivardefs.name: period
ivardefs.desc: The period of time from the activation of the flag to inactivation of the flag. If the flag is active, the end of the period should be unspecified.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The patient, location, group , organization , or practitioner, etc. this is about record this flag is associated with.
